headline: Will Viatris’ (VTRS) New Transformation Role Accelerate Its Operational and Cultural Overhaul?
summary: On August 19, 2025, Viatris Inc. announced it had appointed Andrew Enrietti as Chief Administrative and Transformation Officer, a newly created position consolidating leadership for multiple core functions including HR, IT, and business transformation. This appointment centralizes oversight of key operational areas, reflecting Viatris’ push to accelerate digital, cultural, and structural transformation as part of its broader strategic evolution. We'll examine how Enrietti’s leadership in...
